actionConfiguration.body:
SELECT 
  im."HerdMedicineID",
  im."HerdID",
  s."HerdName",
  im."MedicineID",
  ml."MedicineName",
  im."MedicineDate",
  im."HerdDosage",
  im."MedUnitCost",
  im."DosageCost",
  im."HerdMedNotes"
FROM "HERD_MEDICINE" AS im
JOIN "HERDS" AS s ON im."HerdID" = s."HerdID"
JOIN "MEDICINE_LIST" AS ml ON im."MedicineID" = ml."MedicineID"
ORDER BY im."MedicineDate" DESC;
